name: SideQuest
description: A open app store for mobile android based VR devices such as the Levovo Mirage, Oculus Go, Oculus Quest, Vive Focus.
author: Shane Harris

scripts.start: concurrently "yarn electron-build && yarn platform-tools && wait-on http-get://localhost:4205/ && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev electron ." "cd desktop-app && ng serve --port 4205"
scripts.start:test: concurrently "yarn electron-build && yarn platform-tools && wait-on http-get://localhost:4205/ && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev SQ_ENV_CFG=test electron ." "cd desktop-app && ng serve -c test --port 4205"
scripts.start:sidetest: concurrently "yarn electron-build && yarn platform-tools && wait-on http-get://localhost:4205/ && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev SQ_ENV_CFG=test electron ." "cd desktop-app && ng serve -c test --port 4205"
scripts.start:test2: concurrently "yarn electron-build && yarn platform-tools && wait-on http-get://localhost:4205/ && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev SQ_ENV_CFG=test2 electron ." "cd desktop-app && ng serve -c test2 --port 4205"
scripts.start:local: concurrently "yarn electron-build && yarn platform-tools && wait-on http-get://localhost:4205/ && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev SQ_ENV_CFG=local electron ." "cd desktop-app && ng serve -c local --port 4205"
scripts.start:localhost: concurrently "yarn electron-build && yarn platform-tools && wait-on http-get://localhost:4205/ && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev SQ_ENV_CFG=localhost electron ." "cd desktop-app && ng serve -c localhost --port 4205"
scripts.postinstall: electron-builder install-app-deps && cd desktop-app && yarn install
scripts.dist: yarn electron-build && yarn platform-tools && yarn app-build && node build-electron/make-config && env-cmd --silent electron-builder --publish onTagOrDraft
scripts.build:win: yarn electron-build && yarn platform-tools && yarn app-build && node build-electron/make-config && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder --win
scripts.build:linux: yarn electron-build && yarn platform-tools && yarn app-build && node build-electron/make-config && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder --linux
scripts.build:mac: yarn electron-build && yarn platform-tools && yarn app-build && node build-electron/make-config && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder --mac
scripts.dist:test: yarn electron-build && yarn platform-tools && yarn app-build-test && node build-electron/make-config test && cross-env NODE_ENV=production SQ_ENV_CFG=test electron-builder
scripts.dist:sidetest: yarn electron-build && yarn platform-tools && yarn app-build-test && node build-electron/make-config test && cross-env NODE_ENV=production SQ_ENV_CFG=test electron-builder
scripts.dist:fried: yarn electron-build && yarn platform-tools && yarn app-build-fried && node build-electron/make-config fried && cross-env NODE_ENV=production SQ_ENV_CFG=fried electron-builder
scripts.dist:localhost: yarn electron-build && yarn platform-tools && yarn app-build-localhost && node build-electron/make-config localhost && cross-env SQ_ENV_CFG=localhost electron-builder --linux
scripts.electron-dev:test: yarn platform-tools && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev SQ_ENV_CFG=test electron .
scripts.electron-dev:test2: yarn platform-tools && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev SQ_ENV_CFG=test2 electron .
scripts.electron-dev:local: yarn platform-tools && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev SQ_ENV_CFG=local electron .
scripts.app-build: cd desktop-app && ng build -c production --aot && cd ..
scripts.app-build-test: cd desktop-app && ng build -c test --aot && cd ..
scripts.app-build-fried: cd desktop-app && ng build -c fried --aot && cd ..
scripts.app-build-localhost: cd desktop-app && ng build -c localhost --aot && cd ..
scripts.reset: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf desktop-app/node_modules && yarn install && cd desktop-app && yarn install
